component.name: GZDoom
component.summary: First-person shooter based on the Doom engine

description.p: Multi-game launcher for Doom era games. Be able to launch Doom, Doom 2, Heretic, Hexen, and Strife all from the same launcher. There is mod and pwad support, and it uses GZDoom on the backend to ensure maximum feature support.

ul.li: Support for WAD, PK3, BEX and DEH
Easy Filtering through your Files (directory-names, mod-names, file extensions)
Using/Creating Savefolders based on the name on used wadlist
SSGL automatically manages your savefolders via engine and Modlist Selection
TODO: Oblige "Build and Play" via configfiles (Also able to resume last built map)
